issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
When a breakpoint is defined, execution stops but Studio doesn't load the source code. Instead it displays "source code not found".

This makes debugging a nightmare.
fields.summary: Source code not found when debugging
fields.environment: Studio 3.2.1.201402041146, SDK 3.2.2 GA, Mac OS X 10.9.2, german localization, Alloy Project

comments.body: Can you please attach your sample code and let us know where are you setting your breakpoints? Also, I would suggest you to update your titanium studio to build 3.2.3 as we have many bug fixes and improvements in the latest release.
Resolving this ticket as the reporter has not provided requested information and we cannot reproduce this issue.
